description: Designed by architects Pollard Thomas Edwards, the £50m scheme delivered 98 new homes. 80 per cent of the homes are affordable including 64 for social rent. Wharf Road is set around two new communal gardens that face Regents canal.

factsheet.heading: New homes
paragraphs: The development provides 99 new homes, 80% of which are affordable, in a mixture of apartments, maisonettes and family houses. Completed in 2018, the site comprises 64 social rent homes, 15 shared ownership homes and 19 homes for private sale. All of the homes have private outdoor space and access to the communal gardens.

factsheet.heading: Location
paragraphs: Wharf Road is in central London and faces onto Regents Canal.  With The City just walking distance, Old Street and Farringdon Underground stations offer connections across London, and Angel’s Underground is one stop from Kings Cross/St Pancras International for links within the UK and beyond.
